import { Component, HostListener, OnInit } from '@angular/core';
import { Manga, User } from 'src/app/interfaces';
import { UserService } from 'src/app/services/user.service';
import { MangaService } from '../../services/manga.service';
import { TokenService } from '../../services/token.service';
import { StatusManga, RatingManga } from '../../interfaces';
import { RatingService } from 'src/app/services/rating.service';
import { StatusService } from 'src/app/services/status.service';
import { ModalserviceService } from '../../services/modalservice.service';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-manga',
  templateUrl: './manga.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./manga.component.scss']
})
export class MangaComponent implements OnInit {

  public windowScrolled = false;
  public mangas: Manga[];
  p: number = 1;
  public user: User;
  public userId:string;
  public status: StatusManga
  public rating: RatingManga
  public manga :Manga={
    alternativeTitles:[],
    genres:[],
    imageRemotePath:"",
    rating:0,
    staff:[],
    title:"",

  }
  
  constructor(private userService:UserService,private mangaService: MangaService,private modalService:ModalserviceService, private tokenService:TokenService, private ratingService:RatingService, private statusService:StatusService) { }

  ngOnInit(): void {
    this.findAllMangas();
    this.findUser();
  }
 
  @HostListener('window:scroll', [])
  onWindowScroll(): void {
    if (
      window.pageYOffset ||
      document.documentElement.scrollTop ||
      document.body.scrollTop > 100
    ) {
      this.windowScrolled = true;
    } else if (
      (this.windowScrolled && window.pageYOffset) ||
      document.documentElement.scrollTop ||
      document.body.scrollTop < 10
    ) {
      this.windowScrolled = false;
    }
  }

  scrollToTop(): void {
    (function smoothscroll() {
      var currentScroll =
        document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop;
      if (currentScroll > 0) {
        window.requestAnimationFrame(smoothscroll);
        window.scrollTo(0, currentScroll - currentScroll / 8);
      }
    })();
  }

  findAllMangas(){
    this.mangaService.findAllMangas().subscribe(resp => {
      this.mangas = resp.mangas;
    })
  }


  initializeStatusAndRating() {
    this.status = {
      mangaId: this.manga._id,
      userId: localStorage.getItem("user")
    }
    this.rating = {
      mangaId: this.manga._id,
      userId: localStorage.getItem("user")
    }
    this.statusService.checkStatusManga(this.status).subscribe(resp => {
      if (resp.manga) {
        this.manga.statusUser = resp.manga.status
        this.ratingService.checkRatingManga(this.rating).subscribe(resp => {
          if (resp.manga) {
            this.manga.ratingUser = resp.manga.rating
            this.modalService.openCloseModalManga();
          } else {
            this.manga.ratingUser = 0;
            this.modalService.openCloseModalManga();
          }
        })
      } else {
        this.manga.statusUser = ""
        this.ratingService.checkRatingManga(this.rating).subscribe(resp => {
          if (resp.manga) {
            this.manga.ratingUser = resp.manga.rating
            this.modalService.openCloseModalManga();
          } else {
            this.manga.ratingUser = 0;
            this.modalService.openCloseModalManga();
          }
        })
      }

    }, err => {

    })
    //this.statusDB = document.getElementById("selectStatus") as HTMLSelectElement;
  }

  editManga(manga?: Manga) {
    this.manga = { ...manga }
    this.initializeStatusAndRating();
  }

  filterManga(text: string) {
    console.log(text);
    this.mangaService.sortMangas(text).subscribe(resp => {
      console.log(resp);
      this.mangas = resp.mangas;
    });
  }
  

  findUser(){
    this.userId = localStorage.getItem('user');
     this.userService.findUserById(this.userId).subscribe(res =>{
      this.user = res.user;
    });
  }

  logout(){
    this.tokenService.logout();
  }

}

<html>

        <input #text (keyup)="filterManga(text.value)" class="form-control mr-sm-2" type="search" placeholder="Search" aria-label="Search">
      </form>
    </div>
      
        <div class="card mb-3 fondo" style="max-width: auto;" [ngStyle]="userId? {'cursor':'pointer'}:{'cursor':'normal'} " *ngFor="let manga of mangas | paginate: { itemsPerPage: 20, currentPage: p }"
          (click)="editManga(manga)">
            <div class="row no-gutters" >
                <div class="col-md-1">
                    <img src="{{manga.imageRemotePath | noImage}}" class="card-img img-thumbnail" alt="...">
                </div>
                <div class="col-md-11">
                    <div class="card-body">
                        <h5 class="card-title">{{manga.title}} <small class="icon">  {{manga.rating | number:'.1-1'}}<i class="fas fa-star"></i></small></h5>
                        <p class="card-text ep">{{manga.plotSummary | noDescription}}</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <br>
            </div>
        </div>
        <pagination-controls class="pagination" (pageChange)="p = $event"></pagination-controls>
    </div>
    <app-navfooter></app-navfooter>
    <button class="btn-float btn-float__top" [ngClass]="{ 'show-scrollTop': windowScrolled }" *ngIf="windowScrolled"
  (click)="scrollToTop()">
  <i class="fas fa-arrow-up"></i>
</button>
</div>

</html>
